item.description:
Hello photographers!

The last meeting was awesome so We are going to stick with the New Meeting format!

The meeting Begins at 7:30 PM the Last Thursday of every month. So from 7:30 to 8:00 will be open and social! Hanging out chit chatting will be encouraged!

The from 8:00 to 9:00 we will have a more organized agenda. A topic, a presentation, a group sharing of images, something related to Photography!

Then from 9 to 9:30 We will hang out again catching up with folks from that evenings topic. We'll clean up and head out by 9:45.

Not sticky or ridged just a but more "photo related" verses "social party" ... folks have told me they come here to share.

So this months discussion topic is PhotoShop! I know all you tech savvy guys want to share! We'll have a computer attached to the projector and a few sample images up so if anyone has a specific question about how to do something in PH we can do a quick down and dirty demo. So come prepared to ask your questions!

Going forward we will be asking for a donation at the meetups of $5.00 to cover costs. However it's not manditory to attend - just please donate if you can...

Cheers,
Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography October Meetup
